rev.desc.rev.desc: Calls apm.bg.engine.stub instead of apm.bg.stub
panel: select.old.page
changed exit for 'if one record selected by query' from
map
to
lock.problem.old
panel: lock.problem.old (added panel...calls apm.lock.object)
record to lock: $axces.original.page
lock name: $axces.lockname
exit: locked: axces.locked
background: true
normal exit: map
Modified the filename on the init.problem rinit panel to:
nullsub($AXCES.FILE, "probsummary")
from "problem".
initializes timezone to GMT prior to field mapping to ensure date/time fields are mapped correctly (new panel added, init.tz.gmt, which calls system.setparms)
Added a process line to set.type, allowing for the correct eventout registration type to be set for an epmu event.
Added a process line to call.setup, allowing for an epmu event type to "reopen" a closed incident.
More changes to skip the open of a ticket if not ticket is found to close. and to keep the type the same so that it will create the correct event out record.
updated the call.setup panel to update the action if the NDpmo event registration was the one being used to update the ticket. This allows that single event to do open update and reopen.

changed path to add a record if multiple tickets were returned from the query, instead of just updatting the first record from the set, also changed it so that $axces.addcond would reset the target file before the mapping of the record.
changed path to include saving of old record
changed it to check the environment record and to take a different path based on the use of paging.
Changed normal exit on axces.error.unlock.1 to axces.error from exit.normal
No change made.
changed the sysblob call to have the correct fields.
no longer use problem now use probsummary so on select.last panel removed the check for last=true

Added process for unlocking the Record if it failed format control validation during event processing. The changes were made to axces.apm. I changed the exit that went to axces.error to now check if a lock name exists and if so to do the unlock before exiting the application.
Nullsub'd (2 in evlist in $AXCES) to "" in eventin query on panel check.filter.2.
Removed "and evexpire in $axces.eventin<evtime in $axces" from the decision on panel check.filter.3
On start, changed $axces.addcond=evaluate(parse(evaluate($AXCES.ADD), 4)) to $axces.addcond=evaluate(parse(evaluate(str($AXCES.ADD)), 4))
Added "reopen" action.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
init another file handle to use as the $L.old variable when opening a new ticket.

descript.descript: Calls apm.bg.engine.stub instead of apm.bg.stub
panel: select.old.page
changed exit for 'if one record selected by query' from
map
to
lock.problem.old
panel: lock.problem.old (added panel...calls apm.lock.object)
record to lock: $axces.original.page
lock name: $axces.lockname
exit: locked: axces.locked
background: true
normal exit: map
Modified the filename on the init.problem rinit panel to:
nullsub($AXCES.FILE, "probsummary")
from "problem".
initializes timezone to GMT prior to field mapping to ensure date/time fields are mapped correctly (new panel added, init.tz.gmt, which calls system.setparms)
Added a process line to set.type, allowing for the correct eventout registration type to be set for an epmu event.
Added a process line to call.setup, allowing for an epmu event type to "reopen" a closed incident.
More changes to skip the open of a ticket if not ticket is found to close. and to keep the type the same so that it will create the correct event out record.
updated the call.setup panel to update the action if the NDpmo event registration was the one being used to update the ticket. This allows that single event to do open update and reopen.

changed path to add a record if multiple tickets were returned from the query, instead of just updatting the first record from the set, also changed it so that $axces.addcond would reset the target file before the mapping of the record.
changed path to include saving of old record
changed it to check the environment record and to take a different path based on the use of paging.
Changed normal exit on axces.error.unlock.1 to axces.error from exit.normal
No change made.
changed the sysblob call to have the correct fields.
no longer use problem now use probsummary so on select.last panel removed the check for last=true

Added process for unlocking the Record if it failed format control validation during event processing. The changes were made to axces.apm. I changed the exit that went to axces.error to now check if a lock name exists and if so to do the unlock before exiting the application.
Nullsub'd (2 in evlist in $AXCES) to "" in eventin query on panel check.filter.2.
Removed "and evexpire in $axces.eventin<evtime in $axces" from the decision on panel check.filter.3
On start, changed $axces.addcond=evaluate(parse(evaluate($AXCES.ADD), 4)) to $axces.addcond=evaluate(parse(evaluate(str($AXCES.ADD)), 4))
Added "reopen" action.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
init another file handle to use as the $L.old variable when opening a new ticket.
